pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+ (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3 / AMD FX series or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 / AMD equivalent with 2GB+ of Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 4650 / AMD FX-8320 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 970/AMD 390 or equivalent with 3GB+ of Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 MB available space

short_description: Delve into Castle Shadowfell using your abilities and defensive structures to slay hordes of monsters. Unlock and craft your deck of defences in this roguelite tower defence survivors game.
